description: This wrap is great for using up leftover roasted vegetables but it is worth the effort to cook up a big batch especially for this recipe.
keywords: Vegie wrap,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Roasted Vegetable & Goats Cheese Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the sliced vegetables in a roasting tin, drizzle with oil and roast for 30 minutes.
Tip the butterbeans into a bowl, add lemon juice and roughly mash.
Spread the butterbean mash on the wraps, top with crumbled goats cheese and roasted vegetables. Fold up to wrap and serve.
